Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2014 06:44PM Chartruse wrote: Hi Musical, I woke up from surgery with the pretty pink binder on (I like the blue one also).  It wears great, and is latex free, since I am allergic.  It was a surprise to have something pretty on instead of bandages.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: Things I have tried this week that made my lymphedema worse coffeelatte tessu
